data.title: Vendor — announcements — Garden State Comic Fest
data.text:
Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Spiderweb Art Gallery is coming to GSCF Morristown 2024!

Spiderweb Art Gallery, or Spiderweb Art, is owned and operated by Greg Hildebrandt and Jean Scrocco. Jean has been representing Greg and his art for over 36 years, and Greg has been creating art for over 56 years, making them the perfect team!

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Blue Juice Comics is coming to GSCF Morristown 2024!

Blue Juice Comics is the comic book publishing arm of Blue Juice Films, Inc. (www.bluejuicefilms.com)

Founded by Thomas Mumme, Adam Miller, Jeremy Schneider, and Michael Misconi in February 2012 to develop, create, and publish THE ACCELERATORS, Blue Juice Comics has grown to include a variety of writers and artists. Our goal is to provide you with entertaining, high-quality comic books and stories that will hopefully leave you wanting more.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Komic Knights are coming to GSCF Morristown 2024!

Komic Knights are CGC SIGNATURE SERIES Dealers Since SINCE 2015 for signatures, sketches, prints, original art & more

Komic Knights are also "DO YOU POOH" official retailers since 2016

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

DJF Comics is coming to GSCF Morristown 2024!

DJF Comics has books from Silver Age to Modern.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Wild Bills will be at GSCF Morristown 24!

Rooted in a commitment as a veteran-owned and operated outfit, Wild Bill’s Craft Beverage Co. ain't just in the business of servin' up the most lip-smackin', genuine, vintage sodas and craft concoctions across the land. Nope, we're fixin' to put our money where our heart is, investin' in the brave men and women who've stood tall for this great land of ours, and for every soul that calls it home.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Hooked on Sabers is coming GSCF Morristown 24!

Started by John & Mary Enck. After John started getting sick, Michael and James came on board as partners in this endeavor. As a solid family foundation, this business is a genuine blending of all four personalities. We are all very proud of the products we offer and stand 100% behind all of our claims.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Isle Of Comics is coming to GSCF Morristown 24!

Isle Of Comics is your Most Trusted Comic Book Store offering a Previews Subscription Ordering Service of new comic book titles and merchandise. Additional services include Comic Grading and Appraising and Comic Book & Collector Memorabilia Preservation.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

The Joe Kubert School will be at Morristown 2024!

The Kubert School, founded by the legendary comic book artist Joe Kubert, stands as an iconic institution in the world of comic book and graphic novel education. Located in Dover, New Jersey, this esteemed institution has nurtured and honed the talents of countless aspiring comic book artists and illustrators.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Black Box Comics is coming to GSCF Morristown 24!

Black Box Comics is an independent publisher based in New York, inspired by those who share an appreciation of comic writing and art, the comic industry, as well as avid readers all over the world who love great characters and great stories.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Stay overnight at Buffalo Bill’s House

Stay overnight at Buffalo Bill’s House the filming location of the Academy Award winning film “The Silence of the Lambs”. Buffalo Bill’s House is a vacation home rental, and guests get the entire home to themselves when they book a stay, providing a private, intimate experience! Featuring 4 luxurious bedrooms and 5 comfortable beds (all fresh bedding and towels provided), sleeping 8 total guests. Highlights include a fully functional kitchen, a full retro-inspired game room complete with a 65″ Smart TV with state of the art surround sound and a selection of over 800 DVD’s/VHS, a host of classic arcade video games, as well as a pool table.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Hot Flips is coming to GSCF: Morristown 2024!

For Over 20 Years HOT FLIPS is your source to purchase the hottest Comic Book Supplies & sports card supplies in the world, including acrylic display cases, sport cards and baseball card supplies, comic books, collectible toys, comic book supplies and more. Remember Hot Flips for all your sports memorabilia supplies and sports collectibles supplies. Check us out, We have the better products than anyone else who says that they are the best. Stop paying extra for a label with less quality.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Zapp Comics is coming to GSCF Morristown 2024

Opened in 1993, Zapp is one of the most successful comic book stores in the United States with two New Jersey locations! We celebrate our 30th anniversary this year! Zapp! offers a massive selection of comics, toys, and collectible cards! Our stock is always changing!

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Undisputed Comics King is coming Morristown 24’

Will Damante aka The Undisputed Comics King. You can see him at comic cons throughout the country at the best and biggest shows! Whether you're looking to buy or sell comics from Marvel or DC, new issues to rare classics.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Make room for the Time Enforcers coming to GSCF Morristown June 22-23rd!

Time Enforcers is a Role-Playing Video Game and a story-rich Digital Comic . . . with a twist.

Not only will you help the Galactic Space-Time Consortium thwart Chronolith's evil schemes to rule over all manner of time and space, but you may learn something about the history of other times and civilizations along the way.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Festers Funhouse is coming to GSCF Morristown 24’

They will have a Huge selection of Toys, Knives, Swords, Airsoft, and of course COMIC BOOKS! With an inventory that spans from Silver Age to Current this will be a comic lovers dream of going through. Who knows what gems you may find!Whatever your hobby is these guys have it all

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Agents of Slabs will be at GSCF: Morristown 24’

GSCF's Exclusive CGC facilitator, Agents Of SLABS Signature Service, one of the best companies around will be at GSCF Morristown June 22-23rd!

Read More

Vendor, CGC Eric Bellomo Vendor, CGC Eric Bellomo

The Collectible Conservancy will be at Winter Fest 24’

The Collectible Conservancy will be accepting on-site grading submissions (not on-site grading) and CGC Signature Series witnessing. If you’ve never heard of the Collectible Conservancy, chances are if you're in the industry you know the company's founder, Brandon Daza. Brandon has spent more than a decade in the comic pressing, cleaning, and conservation

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Nemesis Comics and Games is coming to Garden State Comic Fest Winter Fest 24’

The top comic shop in Sussex County will be setting up bringing great comics, trading cards and other games. They will also be running some great Magic Tournaments Both Saturday and Sunday.

Read More

Vendor Eric Bellomo Vendor Eric Bellomo

Fester’s Funhouse is coming to Garden State Winter Fest this January 27-28th at the

Fester's carries various types of collectibles from Comics to Knives, Swords, Airsoft, and everything in between. They will have a great setup at Winter Edition. We are all looking forward to it!!

Read More
